ComicInfo.Title: "...And How Shall Mortals Know Ye?"
ComicInfo.Summary: "...And How Shall Mortals Know Ye?": A television writer seeking material for a Thor program conducts interviews with various people who knew Thor personally or briefly encountered him.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:24:13. [Issue ID 44850]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Vizier,Doctor Graham,Felix (director),Red Norvell (cameraman, also as Thor, flashback),Jimmy Kincaid (Jane Foster-Kincaid and Dr. Keith Kincaid's infant son),Joey Burnett (sound man, flashback),Simon Anderson (writer),Madelyn Arnstein (writer)
